SpeciesGroup.Description: To which species group livestock belongs (1 = cattle, 2 = pigs)

isRuminant.Description: true if the livestock are ruminants

isDairy.Description: true if the livestock are dairy animals

mu_base.Units: Proportion per unit of energy intake, normalised by maintenance energy demand
mu_base.Description: Energy intake below which there is no reduction in utilisation of energy

mu_b.Units: Proportion per unit of energy intake, normalised by maintenance energy demand
mu_b.Description: Rate of reduction in energy utilisation with increasing energy intake

growthNconc.Description: Concentration of nitrogen in animal growth

growthCconc.Description: Concentration of carbon in animal growth

maintenanceEnergyCoeff.Description: Coefficient in calculation of maintenance energy requirement

milkAdjustmentCoeff.Description: Energy requirement per unit of milk produced

urineProp.Description: Proportion of carbon excreted in urine

HousedDuringGrazing.Description: Is true if animals are housing during part of the day when grazed

entericTier2MCF.Units: kg methane per MJ energy intake

Mortality.Description: Proportion of livestock dying on the farm

nitrateEfficiency.Units: kg methane oxidized per kg nitrate
nitrateEfficiency.Description: efficiency of nitrate in feed in reducing methane emissions
